long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BuddyDo is specifically designed to bring communities together.

BuddyDo is the best way for nonprofits to work with volunteers. From making announcements and sharing information, to planning events and coordinating volunteer tasks, BuddyDo keeps everyone connected, organized and in sync so you can focus on your cause. Whether you are a large organization coordinating multiple volunteer teams or a passionate small community group, BuddyDo could help you do more together on the go or from your desk with one convenient app, saving you the hassle of setting up every volunteer on multiple apps. BuddyDo shortens the distance between people and amplify the positive effects through productive community and group activities. 

- Organize volunteers with groups by team, location, event, and project or however fits your community.
- Broadcast information to your whole organization through the community wall or just share with selected groups by posting individual group walls.
- Chat with your whole community, chat with a group or chat individually to a person
- Invite and organize volunteers to participate in events with detailed event-creator.
- Work together on shared tasks. You can manage progress by assigning people, setting due dates, creating sub-tasks, monitor progress and send reminders.
- Use polls to collect feedback or make group decisions.
- Create shared photo albums to record events, capture special moments, share achievements or just for fun.
- Easily invite volunteers to join, manage your volunteers with the community roster, and control your community space with flexible privacy and permission settings.
- Internal management including organization tool for community structure and use the approvals tool for everything that requires multiple-leveled approval.
long.zh_CN:
不只聊天和分享动态，BuddyDo 提供了大社区和小群组更有效地办活动、分配任务、分享相册、写笔记、办投票、开团购、共享上传文件！一对一加好友、几十人建群组...甚至大至1000人的团队建社区，社区內再內建多个小群组拥有各自的讨论空间，BuddyDo 都将是你最佳的选择！
凝聚你的生活圈：不论是家人、情侣、同学、朋友、同事、工作团队、校友会、社团、球队、粉丝团、邻居、志愿者、宗教团体…任何你想得到的社区和群组，只要拥有 BuddyDo ，包你一手掌握所有动态。
你的社区，你做主：为管理社区和群组而生的 BuddyDo，让你轻易创建管理你的社区和群组。不同群组拥有不同的专属应用工具（如记帐、共享的电话本、请假、客户管理…），当然，也可以探索加入更多你有兴趣的公开社区或群组，拓展你的生活圈喔！
一起做更多： 除了社交，你可以利用任务开采购清单请老公照单购买或请家长准备亲子活动的小点心、用相册和家人朋友分享开心出游的照片、用投票表决与同事聚餐的餐厅或工作上难以取舍的好点子、与健身达人一起办活动进行减脂挑战计划、用笔记分享你独特的观点...BuddyDo 提供众多实用小工具帮你解决所有繁琐的事情，让你专注享受乐趣，Buddy Do - Do more together！

《通过一起Do！体验互动的乐趣，凝聚你的生活圈》
• 跨平台交流不受限》无论是手机/平板/电脑等装置皆可操作，和你的Buddy随时互动！
• 你的社区，你做主》自行管理你的社区/群组，不受干扰专注互动，享受更有效率沟通！
• 探索同好拓展社交》依你的兴趣加入公开主题群组，大聊美食/旅游/保养...想聊就聊！
• 体验多元互动乐趣》聊天/分享相册、文件/团购/办活动/投票/分帐…一起Do！更快乐！

全新的社区互动体验平台，更多有趣功能，连接你的好友与生活，欢迎一起Do more together！

更多服务信息欢迎上BuddyDo官方平台
官网网址：https://portal.buddydo.com.cn/zh-hans/
